questions.question: Psychologists generally prefer the experimental method to other research methods because...

choices.answer: Experiments tend to support psychologists' hypothesis
It's easier to obtain a random sample for an experiment
Double-blind designs are unnecessary in an experiment

choices.answer: Exposure to violent television increases aggression

questions.question: One of the principal differences between ethical guidelines for human and animal research is

choices.answer: Human participants can be deceived while animals cannot
Animals can be put in much more physical risk than humans
Environmental conditions for animals are less monitored
Human participates are chosen more carefully than animals

Why is operational definition necessary when reporting research findings?

choices.answer: It provides more context & includes many ex. of the concept

choices.answer: Are most students politically liberal or conservative?
